long_description: The Kryptonite KryptoFlex(R) 1018 cable lock features an easy-to-use design and offers cable security for low-crime areas. Flexible, 10mm braided-steel cable provides solid cut-resistance; cable is coated to help protect the finish of your bike frame. Advanced lock cylinder provides greater protection from picking; dual sliding weather guards automatically close to protect lock internals. Offering great convenience, the lock head rotates 360deg for easy access during lock-up and removal. The Kryptonite KryptoFlex 1018 cable lock comes with 2 keys. Kryptonite rates this lock a 3 on a 12-point system with 1 being simple, deterrent security and 12 being extreme security.
short_description: The Kryptonite KryptoFlex(R) 1018 cable lock features an easy-to-use design and offers cable security for low-crime areas.
